identified_line.line: 1. Histologically or cytologically confirmed advanced DTC (papillary, follicular, Hurthle cell);

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Histologically or cytologically confirmed
advanced DTC (papillary, follicular, Hurthle cell)

identified_line.line: 2. Absence of sensitivity to therapeutic radioiodine;

criterions.exact_snippets: Absence of sensitivity to therapeutic radioiodine

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Absence of sensitivity to therapeutic radioiodine

identified_line.line: 3. Measurable disease, defined as at least one non-bony lesion that can be accurately measured in at least one dimension as confirmed with spiral CT scan

criterions.exact_snippets: Measurable disease, defined as at least one non-bony lesion
at least one non-bony lesion that can be accurately measured in at least one dimension

requirement.expected_value: accurately measured in at least one dimension

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Measurable disease, defined as at least one non-bony lesion
at least one non-bony lesion that can be accurately measured in at least one dimension

requirement.expected_value: accurately measured in at least one dimension

and_criteria.exact_snippets: confirmed with spiral CT scan

identified_line.line: 4. Life expectancy >3 months; ECOG performance status (PS) 0, 1, or 2; Karnofsky performance status of ≥60%;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Life expectancy >3 months
ECOG performance status (PS) 0, 1, or 2
Karnofsky performance status of ≥60%

identified_line.line: 5. Subjects with a normal/acceptable hematological profile

and_criteria.exact_snippets: normal/acceptable hematological profile

identified_line.line: 6. Subjects with adequate renal function

and_criteria.exact_snippets: adequate renal function

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed

identified_line.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years

and_criteria.exact_snippets: minimum age of 18 Years

identified_line.line: 1. Presence of any of the following:

criterions.exact_snippets: Presence of any of the following

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Presence of any of the following

identified_line.line: * Radiotherapy or chemotherapy <4 weeks prior to baseline visit; (Concurrent and/or prior therapy with octreotide will be allowed, provided tumor progression on this therapy has been demonstrated; Concurrent and/or prior therapy with biphosphonates will be allowed)

criterions.exact_snippets: Radiotherapy ... <4 weeks prior to baseline visit
chemotherapy <4 weeks prior to baseline visit
Concurrent and/or prior therapy with octreotide ... tumor progression on this therapy has been demonstrated
Concurrent and/or prior therapy with biphosphonates will be allowed

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Radiotherapy ... <4 weeks prior to baseline visit
chemotherapy <4 weeks prior to baseline visit
Concurrent and/or prior therapy with octreotide ... tumor progression on this therapy has been demonstrated

identified_line.line: 2. Major surgery <4 weeks prior to baseline visit;

criterions.exact_snippets: Major surgery <4 weeks prior to baseline visit

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Major surgery <4 weeks prior to baseline visit

identified_line.line: 3. Any other ongoing investigational agents within 4 weeks before dosing;

criterions.exact_snippets: Any other ongoing investigational agents within 4 weeks before dosing
Any other ongoing investigational agents within 4 weeks before dosing

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Any other ongoing investigational agents within 4 weeks before dosing
Any other ongoing investigational agents within 4 weeks before dosing

identified_line.line: 4. Subjects who suffered from an acute cardiac event within the last 12 months, including myocardial infarction, cardiac arrythmia, admission for unstable angina, cardiac angioplasty, or stenting;

criterions.exact_snippets: acute cardiac event within the last 12 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: acute cardiac event within the last 12 months

identified_line.line: 5. QTc prolongation (defined as QTc interval ≥500 msecs) or other significant ECG abnormalities (e.g. frequent ventricular ectopy, evidence of ongoing myocardial ischemia);

criterions.exact_snippets: QTc prolongation (defined as QTc interval ≥500 msecs)
other significant ECG abnormalities (e.g. frequent ventricular ectopy, evidence of ongoing myocardial ischemia)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: QTc prolongation (defined as QTc interval ≥500 msecs)
other significant ECG abnormalities (e.g. frequent ventricular ectopy, evidence of ongoing myocardial ischemia)

identified_line.line: 6. Subjects with active vascular disease, either myocardial or peripheral;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: active vascular disease
myocardial
active vascular disease
peripheral

identified_line.line: 9. Subjects with known CNS metastatic disease (Exception: Subjects with treated CNS metastases stable by radiographic examinations >6 months after definitive therapy administered, are eligible);

criterions.exact_snippets: treated CNS metastases stable by radiographic examinations >6 months after definitive therapy administered
treated CNS metastases stable by radiographic examinations >6 months after definitive therapy administered

and_criteria.exact_snippets: known CNS metastatic disease
treated CNS metastases stable by radiographic examinations >6 months after definitive therapy administered
treated CNS metastases stable by radiographic examinations >6 months after definitive therapy administered

identified_line.line: 10. Subjects testing positive to one of the following viruses: HIV, HBV or HCV;

identified_line.line: * Serious or non-healing wound, ulcer, or bone fracture;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Serious or non-healing wound
Serious or non-healing wound

identified_line.line: * History of abdominal fistula, gastro-intestinal perforation, active diverticulitis, intra-abdominal abscess or gastro-intestinal tract bleeding within 6 months of dosing;

or_criteria.exact_snippets: gastro-intestinal tract bleeding within 6 months of dosing

identified_line.line: * Any history of cerebrovascular accident (CVA) within 6 months of dosing;

identified_line.line: * History of bleeding disorder, including subjects with hemophilia, disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC), or any other abnormality of coagulation potentially predisposing subjects to bleeding;

identified_line.line: * Poorly controlled depression or anxiety disorder, or recent (within the previous 6 months) suicidal ideation;

11. Any of the following conditions:
* Radiotherapy to ≥25% of bone marrow;
